title: Signing into alpha issue
body: recently got accepted to help with alpha testing but can't sign in? is there something im doing wrong? Kind of new to this.

replies.body:
Are you ensuring you're logging into the right region? There's a little drop-down menu just below the password box that lets you select the region. 

[Send me a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of the login error you're seeing with that drop-down menu expanded so I can confirm you're logging in with the right region selected. Be sure to crop out your username so we don't add security risks to your account.
I figured it out eventually thank you
